item.description:
TIME: 6:45 pm ( if you wish to have dinner before the show)
7:30 pm ( music begins @ 8:00)

TICKET COST: $15.00 in advance
$19.00 day of the show

Music begins @ 8pm.
Jody Williams
& his All-Star Band

Jody Williams is a Chicago blues guitar-slinger who literally attended the same school as his friend Bo Diddley. You've heard his playing, too, if you've heard Bo Diddley's "Who Do You Love.? Like Hubert Sumlin, Jody played lead guitar behind the great Howlin' Wolf. He also invented many riffs you've heard in other songs; often without the proper credit. A contemporary of Magic Sam, Otis Rush and Buddy Guy: and among the last surviving guitarists from the Chicago blues scene of the 1950s; Williams emerged from retirement in the 1990s and recorded two CDs, Return of a Legend and You Left Me in the Dark.
He's making a special East Coast tour ( 3 gigs only) with an all-star band. One is @ The Bull Run. don't miss it!

?One of the unsung heroes of the blues guitar? - Bill Dahl, All Music Guide.

Opener: Brian Templeton - Maybe you remember him from The Radio Kings, or his days with Little Milton, or Monster Mike Welch, , or Otis Grands, or Sonny Rhodes.. Or maybe you just remember that with his powerful voice and commanding stage presence he is easily one of Boston's most dynamic performers
item.how_to_find_us: I'm sorry, but I am unable to attend this meetup.
item.why: The Bull Run is one of 3 only on the East Coast tour for Jody Williams and an all-star band. Don't miss it! We had a fantastic night the last time we were here for "Roomful of Blues!"
item.name: JODY WILLIAMS @ The Bull Run Concert Series
